Preacher Moore has indestructible as long as it's your turn.
Creatures you control have “Deadeye – {2}: Defending player gets a sin counter. Then if that player has seven or more sin counters, they lose the game.” [i](The first time a creature deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate its deadeye ability. It costs {0} if it's equipped.)[/i]
